description:
22 years ago, a boy, Takeshi Todo attempted to take over the world together with the devil from the computer world. He reformed himself after the battle and now he needs the power of the hyper agent.
Again, the evil is going to appear in the real world.
A materialized monster is now approaching! Enter the battle code! The access code is..."GRIDMAN"
Source: Official page

titles.title: Denkou Choujin Gridman: Boys Invent Great Hero
Lightning Superman Gridman: Boys Invent Great Hero
電光超人グリッドマン boys invent great hero
